column1: Facing north, build three stacks of two orange blocks, then destroy the bottom orange block on all three stacks
Make a row with 3 orange blocks next to each other
Place another green block to the southeastern side of the eastern most block.
Place a green block to the west of the green block that's already present. Then, destroy the green block that's there.
Place another green block diagonally to the southwest of the existing green block.
Place three orange blocks next to each other in the middle of the space.
Facing north, move near the edge of the game area and build a stack of 6 yellow blocks
In the middle of the grid build a column of 6 yellow blocks. Break the third block you placed.
Place one yellow block the left and the right of the second highest block.
Leaving one empty cell to the left of the yellow structure, build a column of three green blocks. Break the first block placed.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks to the left of the topmost green block, horizontally.
Facing north, add two green block on the top of the green block on the left (it will make a tower of 4 green block)
Place two green blocks on top of the leftmost green block.
Break the highest two blocks of the rightmost green tower.
Add one green block below the leftmost green tower.
Stack 6 yellow blocks in the middle of the grid, break the 3rd block from the bottom.
Stack a yellow block on another yellow block
Stack a yellow block on a yellow block
Remove 3 yellow blocks
place a yellow block atop the yellow block
place three yellow blocks above the yellow blocks, skipping one space, leaving a blank in between
place two yellow blocks vertically atop the highest yellow block
Place a green block on the eastern side of the block that's the second to highest, and do the same on the western side. The resulting structure should look like a plus sign from the northern view.
Destroy the two green blocks and replace them with yellow blocks.
place green block two squares west of the second level yellow block
Stack 6 yellow blocks in the middle of the grid, the break the 3rd block from the bottom.

Facing north, skip one square to the left of the yellow tower and stack 3 green blocks, so that there's a 1 block gap between the green blocks and the bottom two yellow blocks, then, finally, break the bottom green block.
Move forward 4 steps, and place a yellow block

Place 5 yellow blocks on top of the existing one;
Break the second block you placed.
Place a yellow block to the left and right of the second block from the top.

Skip one square to the left of the 2 blocks tall yellow tower and build a 3 blocks tall green tower;
Break the bottom green block.
Skip one square to the left of the current green tower and build a column of 5 green blocks. Break the bottom block of the tower you just built.
Between the two green towers, build a column of three green blocks. Destroy the bottom two blocks of the tower you just built.
Build a 6 blocks tall yellow tower and break the third block from the bottom.

Build a six blocks tall yellow tower on the middle of the grid;
Break the third block from the bottom
Facing north, place a yellow block to the left and right of the second yellow block from the top.
Facing north, skip one square to the left of the yellow tower and build a 3 blocks tall green tower, then break the bottom green block.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks to the left of the top green block.
Facing north, place two green blocks on top of the leftmost green block and one under it.
Facing north, build a row of three stacks of four red blocks
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall and 3 blocks wide vertical red rectangle from left to right in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place two orange blocks horizontally to the left of the second row of the rectangle, from the bottom.
Place an orange block on the four red blocks in the center.
Facing north, stack 2 orange blocks on top of the leftmost orange block.
Facing north, place an orange block to the left of the leftmost red block of the top row.
Facing north, place a red block to the right of the rightmost red block, then place a red block on top of that, then break the first block you placed.
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall 3 blocks wide vertical red rectangle from left to right in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place an orange block to the left of both existing orange blocks.
Facing north, place an orange block in between the two leftmost orange blocks.
place an orange block on top of the middle red block.
Facing north, place a red block to the right of the 2nd red block from the top.
Facing north, place a red block to the right of the rightmost red block, then place a red block on top of that, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing south, place 3 red blocks side by side
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall 3 blocks wide vertical red rectangle, from left to right, in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, stack 4 orange blocks immediately to the left of the red rectangle, then break the 1st and 3rd orange blocks from the bottom.
Facing north, place an orange block to the left of both exiting orange blocks.
Facing north, place an orange block in between the two leftmost orange blocks.
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall 3 blocks wide vertical red rectangle, from left to right, in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, stack 4 orange blocks immediately to the left of the red rectangle, then break the 1st and 3rd orange blocks from the bottom.
Facing north, build a stack of 4 yellow blocks
place a yellow block atop each yellow block
stack 2 orange left of the eastern most yellow block stack
place 2 yellow blocks atop each yellow block stack
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall 3 blocks wide vertical yellow rectangle, from left to right, in the middle of the grid.
Facing SOUTH, stack 3 red blocks right in front of the left column and right column of the yellow rectangle, then break the middle blocks of both red towers.
Facing SOUTH, place a red block in front of all existing red blocks.
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall 3 blocks wide vertical yellow rectangle, from left to right, in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall 3 blocks wide vertical yellow rectangle, from left to right, in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, build a 3 blocks long and 4 blocks tall yellow rectangle from left to right in the middle of the grid.
In front of the left side of the yellow rectangle, build a column of four red blocks. Break the bottom block of the column. Do the same for the right side of the yellow rectangle.
Build two red columns identical with the current red towers on the other side of the yellow rectangle. Destroy the initial red towers.

Place three more red blocks behind each red column;
Break the middle block of both old red columns;

Facing East, on the 6th column counting from the left and the 4th row counting from the bottom, build a tower of 2 orange blocks. After that, build a tower of 4 yellow blocks directly behind the orange blocks.
Facing North, place a yellow block on top of the yellow block 6 rows in from the West.
Facing North, place a yellow block on top of the yellow block that is 6 rows in from the West.
Facing North, place a yellow block on top of the yellow block 6 rows in from the West.
Facing North, Build 2 orange blocks (Stacking on top) of the right side of the existing yellow blocks (As similar to left side).
Move the red block left side one step (Near to 2nd yellow block from left and bottom)
Facing West, Build a red block at the right side of the existing red block.
Facing West, Build 2 red blocks (stacking on top) on top of the right most red block.
Facing West, Build a red block at the left side of the upper red block (Should be contact with upper yellow block)
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall and 3 blocks wide vertical rectangle from left to right.
Facing north, build a tower of two red blocks, then destroy the bottom red block
Place a red block in the middle of the grid, one level higher.
Facing north, build a 3 by 3 vertical purple square from left to right, centered behind the red block, one block higher than the grid.
Facing north, build a 3 by 3 purple square right behind the red block, from left to right, centered behind the red block, but one level higher than the grid.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the leftmost block of the top row, and another one to the right of the rightmost block of the top row.
Facing north, Build a Red block on top of the existing red block.
Facing North, Destroy the bottom red block.
Facing North, Build a red block on top of the red block.
Facing North, Build 3 purple blocks on top of the purple blocks as arranged previously.
Facing North, Destroy the blue blocks on both the side. Also Destroy the bottom side Red and purple blocks.
Facing North, Build a blue on top of the left most purple block.
Facing north, Build a blue block left side of the existing blue block.
Place a red block one level higher in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, build a 3 by 3 vertical purple square, from left to right, one level higher than the grid, right behind the red block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the right of the rightmost purple block and to the left of the leftmost purple block OF THE TOP ROW.
Place a blue block on top of each existing blue block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the right of the leftmost blue block and another one to the left of the rightmost blue block.
Facing north, put 3 purple blocks side by side
Put 3 purple blocks in a row
put a red block in front of the middle purple block
place two purple blocks atop each purple block
place blue block atop highest western purple block
Place a blue block on the top westmost purple block.
Destroy the topmost blue block on the eastern side of the structure.
put a red block on top of the red block
remove the bottom red block
Remove the bottom purple blocks. All three of them
Place a blue block on top of the west-most purple block. That is, not touching the existing blue block (there's a space between).
remove the blue blocks on each side
Place a row of three blue blocks on top of the existing structure. Then, destroy the middle one.
replace blue blocks with purple
Place a red block in the middle of the grid, one block higher than the ground.

Facing north, build a 3 by 3 vertical purple square from left to right, immediately behind the red block, one block above the ground, the center column of the square should be aligned with the red block.
Place a blue block on top of the leftmost and rightmost purple block of the top row.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the leftmost blue block and another one to the right of the rightmost blue block.
Facing north, place a blue block under both the leftmost and rightmost blue blocks.
Facing north, build a 3 by 3 vertical purple square, from left to right, in the middle of the grid, one block higher than the ground.
Place a red block in front of the central purple block
Place one red block in the middle, one level up than the ground.
Behind the red block, build a 3x3 square of purple blocks centered around the red block. The purple block should be one level higher than the ground.

Place a blue block on top of the leftmost top purple block;
Do the same on the rightmost one.
Place a blue block on top of the rightmost and leftmost and rightmost blue blocks.
One level from the grid, build a 3 by 3 purple square from left to right in the middle of the grid.
Place a red block in front of the middle purple block of the bottom row.
In the middle of the grid, place a red block one block higher.
4 Facing north, build a 3 by 3 purple square behind the red block, one block higher than the grid.
Place a blue block on top of both the left and right top purple blocks.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the leftmost blue block and another one to the right of the rightmost blue block
In the middle of the grid, place a red block one level higher than the grid.
Facing north, build a 3 by 3 vertical purple square centered behind the red block, one level higher from the grid.
Place a blue block on top of both the rightmost and leftmost top purple blocks.
Place a blue block to the right of the rightmost blue block and another one to the left of the leftmost blue block.
place 1 blue block, skip a space, then another blue block from west to east
Facing North, From the bottom left side area - Move into 5th column and 4th row position. Build a blue block.

Facing north, build 2 blue blocks vertically on top of the existing blue block. Still facing north, build a blue block directly to the left of the middle blue block. Build another blue block directly to the right of the middle blue block. Finally, break the middle blue block. You should have made a cross with a hole in the middle.

Facing South, destroy the left most green block. Build 2 green blocks vertically on top of the existing green block (the one you didn't destroy), so that you have a tower of 3 green blocks. Build a green block immediately to the left of the middle green block, and another one immediately to the right of it. Finally, destroy the middle green block. Your green structure should look like the blue structure behind it.

Facing South, build a purple block on the 6th column counting from the left and the 6th row counting from the bottom. Using this starting purple block as the bottom piece, build a purple structure that looks like the other green and blue structures.
Facing south, place a single purple block on the center.
Facing South, From the bottom left side area - Move into 6th column and 5th row position. Build a purple block.
Stack 3 blue blocks in the middle of the grid, then break the middle one.
place 3 red blocks next to each other
Facing east, back up two spaces, then build a tower of four blue blocks.
Stack 5 green blocks atop each other
Facing south, walk backwards and to your right a little bit, then place a tower of eight blue blocks.
Facing north, go to the top of the blue tower, then place two blue blocks to the right of the top block.
Step forward and place 6 green blocks in a tall stack.
Build two columns of two red blocks each to make together a square.
Facing North, add a green block on the top left of red block
Remove the green block block and place a green block a the right of the remove one
Place two green blocks on top of the topmost green block.
Remove green tower. Shift the others block (reds and one remaining green) to one block higher

Place a green block to the left of the topmost green block;
Break the block to the right of the block you just placed.
Place two more green blocks on top of the topmost one.
Facing north, build a 2 by 2 vertical red square from left to right in the middle of the grid.

Facing north, skip one square to the left of the red square and build another 2 by 2 red square from right to left, one level higher than the grid, so that there's a 1 block gap between the 2 squares.
Facing north, place one more row of red blocks on top of the left red square, break its bottom row.
Facing North, Move to left side red block, Build 2 blocks on top as previous and Destroy the bottom side 2 red blocks.
Facing north, build a 2 by 2 vertical red square, from left to right, in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place a green block on top of the left red block of the top row.
Facing north, place a green block to the left of the existing one, then stack 3 green blocks on top of that, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, build another red square, 2 blocks to the left of the existing one, one level higher than the ground, so it's not touching the ground and there's a 1 block gap between the red squares.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks on top of the leftmost red block.
Facing north, place a green block to the left of the topmost green block.
Facing north, place a green block to the right of the rightmost green block of the top row, then place a green block on top of that, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a 2 by 2 vertical red square from left to right in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place a green block on top of the top left red block, then place a green block to the left of that, then stack 3 green blocks on top of that, finally, break the second block you placed.
Facing north, skip one two blocks to the left of the red square and build another identical square but 1 block higher than the ground, so that there's a 1 block gap between the two squares.
Facing north, stack 2 green blocks on top of the leftmost red block.
Facing north, place a green block to the right of the rightmost green block of the top row, then place a green block on top of that, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a green block to the left of the top block of the 3 blocks tall green tower.
Stack 6 green blocks in the middle of the grid, break the first 3 from the bottom.
Destroy the green tower. Facing north, in the middle of the map, build a 2x2 red block
Facing North, Destroy the front two red block. Build 2 blocks on top of the existing red blocks.
Facing North, From the left Build a Green block on top of the red block.
Facing North, Build 3 green blocks (one by one on top) on the left edge of the existing green block.

Facing north, skip two blocks to the left of the red square and build another 2 by 2 vertical red square, from right to left, one level higher than the ground. There should be a one-block gap between the two squares.
Facing north, stack 2 green blocks on top of the leftmost red block.
Facing north, place a green block to the left of the of the top block of the 3 blocks tall green tower.
Facing north, build a single green block in diagonal of the higher green line, at the right position
Facing North, from the left Destroy the bottom side 2 red blocks.
Facing north, place a red block below each of the two red blocks on the left.
Stack 6 green blocks in the middle of the grid, then break the first three from the bottom.
Place a green block on top of the left red block, then another one to its left, then place 3 green blocks on top of that one, then break the second block you placed
Destroy the green block and Build a green block at the left side on top red block.
Build 3 green blocks by stacking on the left edge of the green block.
Facing North, place 2 green blocks to the left of the topmost green block, then place two blocks under the last block, then break the second block you placed.
Facing north, place 2 red blocks under the leftmost green tower.
Facing north, place 2 red blocks next to the 2 leftmost red blocks, forming a square.
Facing north, place a green block on top of the rightmost green block of the top row, then place another one to the right of it, then break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a green block on top of the left red block of the top row.
Facing north, place a green block to the left of the existing one, then place 3 more green blocks on top of the one you just placed, then break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place two green blocks to the left of the topmost green block, then place two green blocks under the last block you placed.
Facing north, break the leftmost topmost green block.
Facing north, on the top row, place a green block to the right of the rightmost green block, then place another green block on top of that, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place two red blocks below the bottom leftmost green block, then place a red block to the right of both blocks you just placed, forming a 2 by 2 red square.
Build two columns of two red blocks each in order to form a square
Facing north, build a 6 blocks tall green tower immediately to the left of the red square, then break the first 3 green blocks.
Facing north, build a vertical 2 by 2 red square from left to right in the middle of the grid.
Place a green square at the on the right corner (opposite of red corner)
Replace the green block by a yellow one
Place a yellow block on top of the existing one.
Place a green block on the empty corner (opposite to red corner)

Place a green block on top of the existing one;
Place a green block on both sides of the bottom green block.
Place a yellow block on both sides of the bottom yellow block.
Facing north, stack 2 yellow blocks on the top right edge of the grid.
Facing north, stack 2 red blocks on the top left corner of the grid.
Place a red block on both sides of the bottom red block.
Facing north, stack 2 yellow blocks on the top right corner of the grid.
Place a yellow block on both sides of the bottom yellow block.
Facing SOUTH, stack 2 purple blocks on the top right corner of the grid.
Place a purple block on both sides of the bottom purple block.
Facing SOUTH, stack 2 green blocks on the top left corner of the grid.
Place a green block on both sides of the bottom green block.
Facing North, Build a blue block in the left most corner.
Destroy the blue block and build a purple block there.
Facing East, place one green block on the very top right corner of the map.
Facing north, stack 2 yellow blocks on the top right corner of the grid.
Facing north, stack 2 yellow blocks on the top right corner of the grid.
facing north build red block in the north west corner
Facing North, Build two Yellow blocks at left and right of the existing bottom yellow block.
Build 3 Red blocks on existing red block at top, right and left direction respectively.
Facing North, Build 2 purple blocks at the left most corner by one top another.
Break the existing purple block, then, facing south, stack 2 purple blocks on the top right corner of the grid.
Facing north, stack 2 yellow blocks on the top right corner of the grid.
Place a yellow block on both sides of the bottom yellow block.
Facing north, stack 2 red blocks on the top left corner of the grid.
Facing west, Build a red block at the left side of the bottom red block.
Facing south, stack 2 purple blocks on the top right corner of the grid.
Facing North, Build a red block at the right side of the bottom red block.
Place a purple block on both sides of the bottom purple block.
Facing south, stack 2 green blocks at the top left corner of the grid.
Go to the top right edge of the grid and place 2 yellow blocks on top of each other.
Facing north, go to the top left edge and stack 2 red blocks.
Facing South, stack 2 green blocks at the top left edge of the grid.
Place a yellow block on both sides of the bottom yellow block.
Place a block on both sides of the bottom green block.
Place a red block on both sides of the bottom red block.
Place a purple block on both sides of the bottom purple block.
Facing north, stack 2 yellow blocks on the top right edge of the grid.
In the top left corner build a column of two red blocks.
In the top left corner place two yellow blocks on top of each other.
Facing north, break the both yellow blocks, then go to the top right edge of the grid and stack two yellow blocks.
Place a yellow on both sides of the bottom yellow block.
Facing the East, put on green square in the top right corner.
Facing south, stack 2 purple blocks at the top right edge of the grid.
Place one green block on top of the current green block.
Facing south, place a green block on both sides of the bottom green block.
Facing south, place one purple block to the left of the existent purple tower and one purple block in front of the tower.
Place two red blocks in a row from left to right, then leave one square empty and place another two red blocks in the same way.
Facing north, break the middle block of the line, then place a 3 blocks long red line on top of the existing one, from left to right, starting on the 2nd red block from the left.
Facing north, build a 5 blocks long red line from left to right starting at the left edge of the grid.
Facing north, break the middle red block, then place a 3 blocks long red line on top of the existing one, starting on the second red block from the left.
Facing WEST, place 3 blue blocks to the left of the bottom red block closest to you.
Facing north place a blue block on top of each existing blue block.
Facing WEST, break the middle blue block of the top row, then place a blue block to the left of the leftmost blue block and another one to the right of the rightmost blue block OF THE TOP ROW.
Facing north, place 5 red blocks, from left to right, starting at the left edge of the grid, then break the middle block.
Place a blue block on top of the first red block on the left.
Facing north, place 5 red blocks down, from left to right, starting at the left edge of the grid, then break the middle block.
Facing North, Destroy the left side 2 red blocks and Build a blue block next to the red block (right side).
Facing North, Build a Red block on top of the left side block.
Facing north, build two red block at the left of the highest red block, which gives you a line of three red blocks
Facing North, Build a red block down to the left most red block.
Facing WEST, place 3 blue blocks, horizontally, to the left of the red block closest to you.
Facing WEST, place a blue block on top of every existing blue block, then break the middle blue block of the top row.
Facing WEST, place a blue block to the left of leftmost blue block of the top row and another one to the right of the rightmost blue block of the top row.
Facing north, place a red block to the left of the leftmost red block of the bottom row.
On the left edge of the grid place two red blocks from left to right.
In the exact center of the grid, build a tower of 2 red blocks.
Facing south, Build a red block at the left of the bottom red block.
Facing south, Build 2 red blocks at right side of the top side red block (side by side).
Facing South, Build 2 red blocks at bottom of the right most red block (side by side towards right)
Facing west, place 3 blue blocks to the left of the red block closest to you.
Facing West, Build a blue block on top of the left most blue block.
Facing South, Build a blue block on top of the left most red block.
Facing west, place a blue block to the left of both existing blue blocks on the top row.
Facing north, build a tower of 2 red blocks, in the middle of the map
Facing north, place 2 red blocks from left to right on the left edge of the grid.
Facing north, place a red block on top of the right red block, then place two blocks to the right of that one.
Facing north, place a block below the rightmost red block, then place a red block to the right of that.
Facing north, place a blue block on top of the rightmost red block.
Facing west, place a blue block to the left of the existing blue block.
Facing west, place a block below the leftmost blue block, then place two blue blocks to the left of that.
Facing west, place a blue block on top of the leftmost blue block, then place another one to the left of that.
Build a column of 5 purple blocks
Stack 5 purple blocks on top of one another
Make a stack of 5 purple blocks
Place 4 purple blocks to the right of the top most purple block, in a row
place a purple block above and below the high purple block 1 to the left of the eastmost high block
place a purple block 2 east and 3 levels up from the base of the purple stack
facing south put a blue box diagonal to the right of the upper most block.
Replace the blue box with a purple box.
Stack 5 purple blocks in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place 4 purple blocks to the right of the top block of the purple tower.
Facing north, stack 2 purple blocks above and below the 2nd purple block from the right.
Build a column of 5 purple blocks.
Facing North, place 4 purple blocks to the right of the top purple block of the existing tower.

Break every block on the horizontal line, except for the one that's the bottom of the tower;
Place 4 purple blocks to the right of the TOP purple block.
Place a purple block on top and below the fourth purple block on the line.

Break the rightmost purple block;
Shift the staircase-like structures one block to the left.
Stack five purple blocks in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place 4 purple blocks to the right of the top purple block.
Facing north, place 2 purple blocks on top and below the 2nd purple block from the right.
Stack 5 purple blocks in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place 4 purple blocks to the right of the top block.
Facing north, place a purple block on top of the highest one, then place 2 purple blocks under the 2nd purple block from the right.
Facing North, Destroy the bottom purple block at the second block from the left side.
Place another purple block on top of the one that is already there.
Place another purple black on top of the two blocks.
Build a 5 blocks tall purple tower in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, place a purple block on top and under the second purple block from the right.
4 Facing north, place a purple block on top of the top purple block, then another one to the left of that, then break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a block below the lowest purple block (not counting the tower), then place a block to the left of that one, now break the first block you placed.
Build two columns of three purple blocks each separated by an empty square.
Build two columns of three purple blocks each separated by an empty cell.
Stack 3 purple blocks in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, build a 6 blocks tall orange tower to the left of the purple tower, then break the bottom 3 orange blocks.
Facing north, stack 3 purple blocks immediately to the left of the orange blocks.
Facing north, place a blue block on top of the orange tower, then place a blue block to the left and right of that block, finally, break the middle blue block.
Stack 2 yellow blocks on top of the orange tower, break the bottom yellow block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the middle orange block.
Facing north, place a blue block between the two leftmost blue blocks, then place another blue block to the left of that one, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a blue block to the right of the rightmost blue block, then stack 2 blue blocks on top of that one, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the bottom block of the left purple tower.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the bottom block of the right purple tower, one block to the right.
Stack 6 orange blocks in the middle of the grid, then break the first 3 blocks from the bottom.
Facing north, stack 3 purple blocks immediately to the right of the orange tower, starting on the ground.
Facing north, stack 3 purple blocks immediately to the left of the orange tower, starting at ground level.
Facing north, place a blue block on top of the orange tower, then place a blue block to the right and left of that one, break the middle blue block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the right of the rightmost blue block, then stack 2 blue blocks on top of that, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the middle orange block, then place another blue block on top of it, but one block to the left.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the bottom block of the left purple tower.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the bottom block of the right purple tower, then place a purple block to the right of that, finally, break the first block you placed.
Stack 2 yellow blocks on top of the orange tower, then break the bottom yellow block.
Face north, put a purple block in front of another purple block
Put a purple block behind a purple block
remove the purple block furthest north
place purple block three east of southernmost purple block
place a purple block to the east of the south-eastern most purple block
remove the left most purple block.
destroy one block on the left.
Take the rightmost purple block and place that to the left of the current left most block and set it beside it.
Place two purple blocks on top of the northmost block of the cluster found towards the west.
Place a stack of three purple blocks two squares to the east of the existing stack of three purple blocks.
Destroy the northmost purple block and add a purple block two squares to the south.
Place a stack of six red blocks between the two stacks of three purple blocks.
Destroy the bottom three red blocks.
Build two yellow blocks on top of the red blocks.
Destroy the yellow block that is the second from the top.
Build four more purple blocks on top of the western stack of existing purple blocks.
Stack 3 purple blocks in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, stack 6 orange blocks immediately to the right of the purple tower, then break the 3 first orange blocks from the bottom.
Facing north, stack 3 purple blocks immediately to the right of the orange tower, on the ground.
Stack 2 yellow blocks on top of the orange tower, then break the bottom yellow block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the middle orange block, then place a blue block in between the two blue blocks, but one block to the left.
Facing north, place a tower of 3 purple block
Facing North, place a tower of 3 purple block at the left of existing one, leaving a blank space between the two towers
Stack 3 purple blocks in the middle of the grid.
Facing North, at five block from the left, move forward 4 block and place a purple square
Build a 3 blocks tall purple tower behind the existing block.
Place a blue block up to highest purple block, leaving one blank block between them
Facing north, place a maroon block on the right on the blue block
Replace the red block with an orange one.
Place an orange block on top and under the existing one.
Skip over one square to the right of the purple tower and build another one of the same height, so that there's a gap between the towers.

Place a purple block to the right of the purple block that's in front of the right tower;
Break the block I just referred to above so that the two purple structures are not identical anymore.
Place a blue block diagonal to the leftmost blue block (going up and to the right when facing North).

Place two yellow blocks on top of the orange tower;
Break the first block you placed.
Place a blue block to the right of the top yellow block, ONE BLOCK DOWN.

Place a blue block diagonal to the rightmost blue block (GOING UP AND TO THE RIGHT);
Place a blue block on top of the one you just placed.
Facing north, go forward for 4 steps, and place a purple block
Place two purple blocks on top of the existing one.
Skip one square and build a 3 blocks tall purple tower to the right of the existing one.

In between the two towers, build a 6 blocks tall orange tower;
Break the first three blocks you placed.
Build a column of two yellow blocks between the two blue blocks. Destroy the bottom block.
On top of the left purple tower place two blue blocks. Destroy the first block you placed.
Place one red block on top of the lowest blue block. To its left, place a blue block. Break the red block you first placed.
Build a 3 blocks tall purple tower in the middle of the grid.
Facing north, skip one square to the right of the purple tower and build another one of it.
Build a 6 blocks tall orange tower in between the two towers and then break the 3 bottom blocks.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the bottom purple block of the left tower.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the right tower, then place another one to the right of that, then break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the middle orange block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the existing blue block, one block higher.
Facing north, place a blue block on top of the orange tower, then place a blue block to the left and right of it, now break the middle blue block.
Place two yellow blocks on top of the orange tower, then break the bottom yellow block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the right of the rightmost blue block, then place 2 blue blocks on top of that, then break the first block you placed.
In the middle of the grid, build a 3 blocks tall purple tower.
Facing north, skip a square to the right of the tower and build another 3 blocks tall purple tower.
Build a 6 blocks tall orange tower in between the existing ones, then break the bottom 3 orange blocks.
Facing north, place a blue block to the left of the middle orange block.
Facing north, place a blue block on top of the orange tower, then place a blue block to the left and right of that, then break the first block you placed.
Stack two yellow blocks on top of the orange tower, break the bottom yellow block.
Facing north, place a blue block to the right of the rightmost blue block, then place two blocks on top of that, then break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a blue block in between the two leftmost blue blocks, then place a blue block to the left of that one, then break the first block you placed.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the bottom block of the left purple tower.
Facing north, place a purple block in front of the bottom block of the right purple tower, then place a purple block to the right of that, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing North, From the bottom left side area - Move into 4th column and 4th row position. Build 3 yellow blocks by one top of another.
Build each one yellow block at the right and left side of the top most yellow block.
Facing North, build a red block directly to the left of the left most yellow block. Build 2 more red blocks vertically on top of the red block you just built.
Build a 3 red blocks at the left side of the centre red block.
Facing North, Build a blue block at top right corner of the bottom yellow block (diagonally)
Facing south, Build 3 blue blocks on top of the existing blue block.
Facing west, Build each one blue block the right and left side of the top most blue block.
Facing west, walk forwards a little bit, then place a tower of four blue blocks.
Facing north, place a tower of four blue blocks two spaces to the right of the existing tower, then delete the left tower.
Facing North, Build a brown block diagonally at the left corner of the existing brown block.
Facing North, Destroy the side diagonal brown block and Build diagonally at the top right corner of the bottom brown block.
Facing North, Destroy the top side 2 orange blocks.

Facing North, starting from the existing orange block, build 2 orange blocks that extend diagonally upwards to the left, like a staircase. You should end up with a total of 3 orange blocks that are arranged like stairs.
Facing North, Destroy the upper side orange block.

Destroy the existing block.
Facing North, build an orange block on the 4th column counting from the left and the 5th row counting from the bottom. Build a row of 3 orange blocks centered on top of the first orange block you built. Destroy the middle block.
Destroy all of the existing blocks. Facing North, build an orange block on the 4th column counting from the left and the 5th row counting from the bottom.
Facing north, stack 4 green blocks on the right edge of the grid.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks to the left of the bottom green block.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks to the left of the 2nd highest green block.
Facing north, place a green block on top of the leftmost green block, the highest one of the two.
Facing north, skip one square to the left of the big green 'Y' and place 2 yellow blocks, from right to left, one block higher than the ground.
Facing north, place 2 yellow blocks on top of each existing yellow block, then break the 2 middle yellow blocks.
Facing north, skip one block to the left of the big yellow = structure and place 3 purple blocks, from right to left, one level higher than the grid, finally, break the middle purple block.
Place a purple block between the two existing ones, but one level higher.
Facing north, place a purple block on top of the topmost purple block, then place a purple block to the left and right of that one, finally, break the first block you placed.
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall green tower on the right edge of the grid.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks to the left of the bottom green block.
Facing north, stack 4 green blocks on the right edge of the grid.
horizontally left to the bottom green block facing north place 3 green blocks
Facing North, Build a Green block at left side of the second Green block from Top.
Facing North, Build 2 green blocks (one on another) at left side of the green block at top side right to left direction.
Facing north, stack 4 green blocks at the right edge of the grid.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks to the left of the bottom green block.
Facing North, Build 2 green block at the left side of 2nd top green block by side by side.
Facing North, Build a green block at top of the left top most green block.
Facing north, build a 4 blocks tall green tower on the right edge of the grid.
Facing north, place two blocks to the left of the bottom green block.
Facing north, place two blocks to the left of the second green block from the top.
Facing north, place a green block on top of the leftmost green block (the top one).
Facing north, skip one square to the left of the big Y and place two yellow blocks from right to left one block higher than the grid.
Facing north, place two yellow blocks one block higher than the existing yellow blocks (so that there's a gap between the four blocks.
Facing north, skip one block to the left of the yellow structure and place 3 purple blocks one block higher from the grid, from right to left.
Facing north, place a purple block on the MIDDLE of the purple line, then break the block below the one you just placed.
Facing north, place a purple block on top of the top purple block, then place a purple block to the left and right of that one, then break the first block you placed.
Starting from the right side of the grid, build a row of three green blocks. On top of the first block you placed, add three more green blocks on top of each other.
Facing north, place 2 green blocks to the left of the second green block from the top.
Facing north, build a tower of 5 red blocks. Destroy the 2nd and 4th blocks
Facing north, place down 4 purple blocks, from left to right, in the middle of the grid, then break the 2nd block from the left.
Facing north, stack 2 red blocks on top of the purple block on the left.
Facing north, build a 3 by 3 by 3 red cube in the middle of the grid, then break the bottom row.
Facing east, build three towers next to each other of 3 orange blocks each. Destroy the highest block of the middle tower.
To the right of the orange structure, and closer to you than the orange structure, build three towers next to each other of 3 red blocks each and then destroy the bottom block of each tower.

Facing east, build three towers next to each other of 2 orange blocks each. Destroy the bottom block of each tower. Build an identical row of orange blocks behind the first row. Destroy the middle block of the first row.
Facing east, place an orange block on the ground, immediately to the left and right of the orange structure (the row closest to you).
Facing east, behind the middle block of the last row of orange blocks, place a green block. To its right, and one level higher, place another green block.
To the right of the highest green block place another green block one level higher
Stack 3 green blocks in the middle of the grid, then break the bottom 2.
Facing north, place a green block to the left of the existing one, one level lower.
Stack 5 orange blocks in the middle of the grid, then break the bottom 2.
Stack 5 orange blocks in the middle of the grid, then break the bottom 2.
Facing north, on the middle row, place down 9 green blocks, from left to right, starting at the second square from the left edge.
Facing north, stack 8 green blocks on top of the leftmost green block.
Stack 6 yellow blocks in the middle of the grid.
Facing South from the north edge, Build a green block below to the centre red block.
Facing South, Build 2 red blocks below to the right most red block.
In front of the leftmost and rightmost red blocks, add one orange block

Facing West, Destroy the 2 yellow blocks and Build orange blocks instead.
(Note: Replace the 2 yellow blocks with orange blocks.)
On top of the green block, add 2 blue blocks. To the left of the highest blue block, add 2 blue blocks.
Facing West, Build 2 Yellow blocks diagonally at the right corner.
Facing North, Destroy the 2 yellow blocks from left (west to east)
Facing West, Build 2 yellow blocks diagonally at the top right corner of the yellow block.
Facing West, Destroy the right most 2 yellow blocks.

Facing west, to the right of the yellow block build a tower of 2 yellow blocks and then destroy the bottom block. To the right of this block, build a tower of 3 yellow blocks and then destroy the bottom two blocks.
Facing North from the south edge, Build 2 Green over the right Green block by one top of another.
Facing North, Build 2 Green blocks one top of another at the left side of the top most green block.
Facing North, Destroy the right most 2 green blocks from the east to west direction.

Facing North, Build 2 Green block at the left side of top side green block.
(Note: Left in the sense towards west direction)

Facing North, Build a green block at the left side of the top most green block.
(Note: Left - Towards west direction)
Facing East from the West edge, Build 4 Blue block side by side towards right of the 1st blue block (Bottom).
Facing North, Build 2 blue block below to the 2nd blue block from the west to east direction.
Facing North, Destroy the 2 right most yellow blocks.
Facing North, Build 2 yellow blocks below to the right most blue blocks (1 each).
Facing West, Build 6 blue blocks at the gap (Fill the existing shape like rectangle)
Destroy the top side 1 block.
Facing North, Build a Orange block on top of the Red block.
Facing North, Build 3 Yellow blocks at the right of the Orange block.
Facing North, Destroy the top side 2 yellow blocks and build 2 yellow blocks side by side towards of the existing yellow block.
To the right of the rightmost yellow block place one orange block. Underneath it, add 3 red blocks.
Facing South, Move into 3rd column from the east and 4th row from north position. Build 2 Red blocks on top of another.
Facing North, Build a orange block on top of the red block.
Stack 5 blue blocks in the middle of the grid, then break the bottom 2.
Place a blue block in the middle of the map, then a red block on top of that.
To the right of the blue block, skip two grid cells and place another blue block. On top of it place a red block.
Facing north, place a green block at the bottom.
Destroy all of the blocks placed down make a stack of 4 blue blocks

put a green block north of the green block
place a green block on the square 2 west and 2 north of the southern most green block

Put a green box in the center of the map.
Put a blue box, a orange box and another blue box on the green box.
Remove all of the blocks except the green one

Facing North, add a block on the green block, any color.
Build a red block between the blue blocks and remove the lower blue box.
Place four blue blocks in a stack, one on top of the other.
